data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Riccardi, Paula Raile (2016): Notes on Bricelochlorops Paganelli 2002 (Diptera: Chloropidae), with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 4114 (1): 87-89, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4114.1.7
